TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCell/DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: 将 的相关信息提供给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。

span.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体包括允许你的应用程序以使用辅助功能客户端应用程序的内置辅助功能支持。Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括屏幕放大器和审阅者实用工具、 语音输入的实用工具、 屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备，以及键盘增强实用工具。Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 类继承自类来提供以下信息辅助功能客户端应用程序。The class inherits from the class to provide information about a to accessibility client applications. 每个类表示的可视部件-如， ，和-还包含继承自的类提供有关包含的类信息和执行代表辅助功能客户端应用程序的操作。Each class that represents a visual part of the —such as , , and —also contains a class that inherits from to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications. 有实例时想要提供其他信息，例如名称或描述控件，辅助功能客户端应用程序。There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the control, to accessibility client applications. 有两种方法来提供这些额外信息。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供有限的辅助功能信息供现有控件，设置控件的和将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的属性值。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. > [!NOTE] > 应更改和属性值仅在极少数情况下，例如，如果你使如下所示列表。You should change the and property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a look like a list. 有时，你可能需要更多的辅助功能信息或可访问性不同操作，将您的自定义包括或。Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom or . 若要自定义可访问性，你可以编写您自己的类派生自或类并重写方法。To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the or classes and override the method. 例如，如果你正在编写实现唯一的自定义操作，例如在你的单元格中，特殊命中测试的自定义的行标题单元格应创建继承自的类类并重写方法。For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the class and override the method. 使用来公开其数据结构值来定义数据表层次结构。The exposes its data structure by using values to define the data table hierarchy. 公开到 Microsoft Active Accessibility 数据表的详细信息，请参阅"公开数据表通过 Microsoft Active Accessibility"在 MSDN 库中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DoDefaultAction() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与 关联的默认操作。

span.span: Performs the default action associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果与此关联的单元格是，此方法不执行任何操作。If the cell associated with this is a , this method does nothing. 否则为此方法选择的单元格，使它成为当前单元格，并采用下列操作之一：Otherwise, this method selects the cell, makes it the current cell, and takes one of the following actions: - 如果该单元格的属性值是`true`，此方法返回。If the cell's property value is `true`, this method returns. - 如果该单元格的属性值是`null`，这意味着该单元格不能承载编辑控件，此方法返回。If the cell's property value is `null`, meaning the cell cannot host an editing control, this method returns. - 如果该单元格当前是否进入或退出编辑模式 (例如，如果调用此方法时，才或事件处理程序)，此方法返回。If the cell is currently entering or leaving edit mode (for example, if this method is called in a or event handler), this method returns. - 如果单元格当前处于编辑模式，此方法将提交并结束编辑。If the cell is currently in edit mode, this method commits and ends the edit. - 如果该单元格处于编辑模式和属性设置为，此方法返回。If the cell is not in edit mode and the property is set to , this method returns. - 如果没有任何前面的操作执行，此方法会导致单元格以进入编辑模式。If none of the preceding actions is taken, this method causes the cell to enter edit mode.

span.span: The names of the owning cell's type and base type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回一个字符串，包含所属单元格的类型名称后跟置于括号内，其基类型的名称如"`DataGridViewTextBoxCell` (`DataGridViewCell`)"。This property returns a string that includes the owning cell's type name followed by the name of its base type in parentheses, such as "`DataGridViewTextBoxCell` (`DataGridViewCell`)".

span.span: A that represents the at the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了其中拥有返回每个参数值的方法。The following table describes which owns the that is returned by the method for each parameter value. |参数值Parameter value|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||当前单元格右侧。The to the right of the current cell. 返回`null`如果当前单元格位于最右侧的列。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the right-most column.| ||当前单元格左侧。The to the left of the current cell. 如果当前单元格位于最左边的列，则返回的行标题的辅助性对象。 returns an accessible object for the row header if the current cell is in the left-most column.| ||了下一步的更高版本索引。The that has the next higher index. 返回`null`如果当前单元格位于第一列。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the first column.| || ，其下一个较低的索引。The that has the next lower index. 返回`null`如果当前单元格是最后一列中。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the last column.| ||中相同的列和当前单元格上方的一行。The in the same column and one row above the current cell. 返回`null`如果当前单元格位于第一行。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the first row.| ||中相同的列和当前单元格下方的一行。The in the same column and one row below the current cell. 返回`null`如果当前单元格位于最后一行。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the last row.| |所有其他值All other values|`null`。`null`.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了所执行操作方法为每个`flags`值。The following table describes the action performed by the method for each `flags` value. |参数值Parameter value|操作Action| |---------------------|------------| ||获取焦点。The takes focus.| ||拥有此获取焦点。The that owns this takes focus.| ||添加到属性。The is added to the property.| ||从删除属性。The is removed from the property.| |所有其他值All other values|不执行任何操作。No action is taken.|

summary.span: 获取 的状态。

span.span: Gets the state of the .
A bitwise combination of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值始终包括和值。The return value always includes the and values. 它还包括值如果选择关联的单元格，则如果单元格具有键盘焦点，则值和时当前未显示该单元格的值。It also includes the value if the associated cell is selected, the value if the cell has keyboard focus, and the value if the cell is not currently displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串表示所属单元格的格式化值。

span.span: Gets or sets a string representing the formatted value of the owning cell.

value.span: 单元格值的 表示形式。

span.span: A representation of the cell value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个字符串，表示单元格的值属性。The property contains a string that represents the value of the cell property. 如果是`null`，包含字符串"(null)"。If is `null`, contains the string "(null)". 将此属性设置不起如果所属的单元格标头单元格，是只读的或者不属于某一行。Setting this property has no effect if the owning cell is a header cell, is read-only, or does not belong to a row. 否则，设置此属性：Otherwise, setting this property: - 结束任何当前正在进行的编辑并提交的值。Ends any edit currently in progress and commits the value. - 使用单元格和方法将指定的值转换为类型由该单元格指示属性。Uses the cell and methods to convert the specified value to the type indicated by the cell property. - 将单元格的值设置为转换后的值。Sets the cell value to the converted value.
